properties.title: Deploy a HCI sandbox host VM

steps.name: basics
steps.label: Sandbox host VM
steps.description: This template will deploy a HCI sandbox VM.

location.label: Region
location.toolTip: Specify the region to deploy the proxy server VM.

elements.name: vmSize
elements.label: Size
elements.toolTip: The VM size for the HCI sandbox VM.

options.text: Specify the administrator account credentials. The credentials are used for the local administrator account on the proxy server VM.

toolTip.password: The administrator password for the VM.

options.text: Save up to 49% with a license you already own using Azure Hybrid Benefit.

elements.name: isUseExistingWindowsServerLicense
elements.label: Would you like to use an existing Windows Server license?

elements.name: isHaveEligibleWindowsServerLicense
elements.label: I confirm I have an eligible Windows Server license with Software Assurance or Windows Server subscription to apply this Azure Hybrid Benefit.

elements.name: osDiskStorageType
elements.label: OS disk storage type
elements.placeholder: Select the OS disk storage type...

allowedValues.label: Premium SSD (LRS)
allowedValues.description: Best for production and performance sensitive workloads. Locally-redundant storage (data is replicated within a single datacenter).

allowedValues.label: Standard SSD (LRS)
allowedValues.description: Best for web servers, lightly used enterprise applications and dev/test. Locally-redundant storage (data is replicated within a single datacenter).

allowedValues.label: Standard HDD (LRS)
allowedValues.description: Best for backup, non-critical, and infrequent access. Locally-redundant storage (data is replicated within a single datacenter).

elements.name: dataDiskStorageType
elements.label: Data disk storage type

allowedValues.label: Premium SSD (LRS)
allowedValues.description: Best for production and performance sensitive workloads. Locally-redundant storage (data is replicated within a single datacenter).

allowedValues.label: Standard SSD (LRS)
allowedValues.description: Best for web servers, lightly used enterprise applications and dev/test. Locally-redundant storage (data is replicated within a single datacenter).

elements.name: isEnableAutoshutdown
elements.label: Enable auto-shutdown
elements.toolTip: Configures your virtual machine to automatically shutdown daily.

elements.name: shutdownTime
elements.label: Shutdown time
elements.toolTip: Configures the time when the virtual machine shuts down daily.

elements.name: shutdownTimeZone
elements.label: Time zone
elements.toolTip: Configures the time zone in which the auto-shutdown time is.
